Name: New
Definition: New lyrics added to the existing lyrics

Name: Modification
Definition: Lyrics modified in the original language

Name: None
Definition: No lyrics have been included in the work

Name: Original
Definition: Lyrics have been used in the original form

Name: Addition
Definition: Lyrics added to a pre-existing instrumental work

Name: Unspecified
Definition: Details of the lyric adaptation are not known at this time
